security_audit.summary: This is a prompt-only skill containing only documentation and task orchestration guidelines. No executable code, scripts, network operations, or file system modifications detected. The skill provides instructions for delegating technical documentation queries to a Context7 researcher agent using standard Task tool functionality.

content.value_statement: Finding accurate API documentation and framework examples wastes development time. This skill delegates technical document queries to a specialized Context7 researcher agent, returning precise code examples and configuration guidance without polluting your conversation context.
actual_capabilities: Delegates technical documentation queries to Context7 researcher agent
Retrieves API usage examples for libraries and frameworks
Fetches configuration parameters and best practices documentation
Explains error causes and provides version-specific solutions
Orchestrates parallel or sequential documentation queries based on task dependencies
limitations: Does not access local project files or codebases
Cannot modify or write files based on documentation findings
Limited to Context7 MCP supported documentation sources
Does not execute or validate retrieved code examples

best_practices: Split complex queries into independent topics for parallel execution
Use sequential execution only when tasks have strong dependencies
Let the agent determine the best query strategy based on your request
Keep prompts focused on specific documentation needs for accurate results
anti_patterns: Making multiple unrelated documentation queries in a single prompt
Requesting general tutorial content instead of specific API documentation
Asking the skill to execute or validate code from documentation
Combining unrelated library queries without clear topic separation

faq.question: Which documentation sources does Context7 support?
faq.answer: Context7 covers major open source libraries and frameworks including Node.js, Python, Go, React, Next.js, Supabase, and many more.

faq.question: How many queries can I make at once?
faq.answer: You can make unlimited queries. For independent topics, parallel execution provides faster results than sequential queries.

faq.question: Can this skill write code based on documentation?
faq.answer: No. This skill only retrieves documentation. Writing and implementing code requires additional agent invocation.

faq.question: Is my code or project data sent externally?
faq.answer: No. The skill only sends your documentation query to the Context7 MCP service. Your project files remain local.

faq.question: What if documentation for my library is missing?
faq.answer: Context7 may not cover all libraries. The agent will indicate if documentation is unavailable and suggest alternatives.

faq.question: How is this different from web search?
faq.answer: Context7 provides structured, verified documentation with code examples from official sources, not generic web search results.
